column5: This was invented to carry supplies for troops.I would love to have one of these!
Yeah, that is amazing! At first I thought it was two guys, but, no, it really is a robot, and works darn fine too!!
Man - I could use one of those to haul all my gear out icefishing!!!  Let me know if anyone sees them on sale at Wallmart.    Don
Wow that thing looks freaky. I think a couple 4 wheelers would do the job though.
Not suitable for one of those delicate, stealthy reconnaissance missions, I presume.
I usually quit fishin with someone that whines that much. However that would be a blast to build.  Art
I thought it was Terry's Quad all dressed up to kill!LOL Wow, one of those puppies would certainly make a Portage a lot easier! I wonder if it has a auger attachment! And a seat?!LOL HH
LOL I bet my ATV cost a lot less money and does more but it is cool
Make It Stop! Make it Stop!... It's freakin' me out man!!!   That's all well and good with the kick to the side... but how well can it take a .50 cal. round?
Should be able to pick one up at BPS next year?
Sorta freaked me out the first time I saw it.I felt bad for it when he kicked it.How could you shoot such a cute puppy? Joe
